effect.effectiveweapons.fire_guard.descr: Reduces all fire damage taken by 40% and cuts burning time in half.
effect.effectiveweapons.elevated.descrip: Increases the affected entity's movement speed by 65% and the user's damage dealt by 50%, reduces user's damage taken by 20%, but user takes 10% of their health as recoil damage after each attack.
effect.effectiveweapons.counter.descript: Reflects all melee damage back at the attacker and grants the affected entity 3 knockback resistance.
effect.effectiveweapons.remote_counter.d: Reflects all projectile damage back at the attacker and grants the affected entity 3 knockback resistance.
effect.effectiveweapons.isolated.descrip: Prevents the affected entity from receiving any additional status effects.
death.attack.pact_axe_recoil_damage: %1$s paid the price of the pact
death.attack.double_bow_recoil_damage: %1$s suffered the recoil of pulling a bow too much
death.attack.counter_reflected_damage: %1$s got their attack reflected back at them
death.attack.counter_reflected_damage.pl: %1$s got their attack reflected back at them by %2$s
death.attack.blade_beam_damage: %1$s got slashed by a blade beam
tooltip.spiraling_sword_cont: a certain amount of damage is dealt
tooltip.spiraling_sword_cont_death: a certain amount of mobs are killed
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge: Charge: increases every time damage is dealt, max: 200
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge_cont: Increase: damage dealt before target's damage reduction
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge_death: Charge: increases every time a mob is killed, max: 100
tooltip.blessed_lance_cont: and deals §e+4§r extra damage to §eundead§r mobs
tooltip.dekaja_tome_cont: all positive status effects active on
tooltip.dekaja_tome_cont_part_two: all entities present in a certain area
tooltip.pact_axe_summary: Deals triple damage, but can backfire
tooltip.pact_axe: Each attack can inflict §edouble§r the user's
tooltip.pact_axe_cont: attack as extra damage, but there is a chance
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_two: the bonus damage may §ebe inflicted on its§r
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_three: §eown user§r or §eremove one of their active effects§r
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_four: Awards the user with extra experience points
tooltip.double_bow_summary: Shoots fixed damage arrows 2 times as far as a regular bow
tooltip.double_bow: Takes longer to shoot, but shoots fixed damage
tooltip.double_bow_cont: arrows twice as far as a regular bow. Charging
tooltip.double_bow_cont_part_two: for 2 seconds guarantees a powerful critical shot,
tooltip.double_bow_cont_part_three: but removes strength or 25% of HP from its user
tooltip.double_bow_damage: Arrow damage = 3 + user's generic damage + strength * 2
tooltip.light_shield_summary: Has no speed penalty, but can
tooltip.light_shield: Has no speed penalty when used and takes
tooltip.light_shield_cont: no durability damage, but can only block
tooltip.sneak_meter: Use while §esneaking§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.sneak_air_meter: §eSneak§r in the §eair§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.entity_meter: Use on §eanother§r entity to activate its meter ability
tooltip.air_meter: Use while §ein the air§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.use_meter: Use (default: right click) to activate its meter ability
tooltip.swing_meter: Swing §ewithout hitting an entity§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.attuned_customization_enabled: Can be customized using an §2Attuning Table§r
tooltip.passive_featherweight_explanatio: Increases user's safe fall height by 3 blocks
tooltip.passive_stride_explanation: Increases user's step height to 1 block
tooltip.passive_sweep_explanation: Increases user's sweep attack damage to 80% of their attack damage
tooltip.passive_sturdy_explanation: Increases user's armor by 3 when held
tooltip.passive_firm_explanation: Increases user's knockback resistance by 3 when held
tooltip.passive_buffer_explanation: Increases user's maximum health by 4 (2 hearts) while held. Does not include healing.
tooltip.passive_tough_explanation: Increases user's armor toughness by 5 when held
tooltip.passive_lumberjack_explanation: Increases user's mining speed by 75% when held
tooltip.passive_mighty_explanation: Increases user's attack damage by 2 when held
tooltip.passive_death_charge_explanation: Increases meter charge by 50% of any killed entity's HP, but meter is not charged when just dealing damage
tooltip.passive_deadeye_explanation: Gives user a zoom in effect when drawing the bow, removes the arrow's deviation and gravity
tooltip.passive_double_shot_explanation: Fires a second, consecutive, arrow when used
tooltip.passive_firm_stance_explanation: User takes no knockback when held, but reduces user's movement speed by 75%
tooltip.passive_frigid_explanation: Freezes all other entities that enter in contact with the cloud
tooltip.passive_acrobatics_explanation: Increases user's jump strength by 50% and reduces fall damage by 50% when held
tooltip.passive_stabbing_explanation: Increases user's attack speed by 0.5 when held
tooltip.passive_mobile_explanation: Increases user's movement speed by 30% and movement efficiency by 35% when held
tooltip.passive_power_swing_explanation: When the user enters the cloud while another entity is inside, grants them strength, speed and haste and inflicts weakness, slowness and mining fatigue on all other entities. Base duration = 10 seconds, extended by 2 seconds for each effect the cloud neutralized
tooltip.passive_isolation_explanation: Inflicts an effect that prevents other effects from being applied on all other entities that enter the cloud. If user is sneaking while holding the tome, grants them the same effect until they stand up or switch items
tooltip.meter_fire_guard_explanation: Grants a status effect that reduces fire damage by 40% and cuts burning time in half
tooltip.meter_lunge_explanation: Launches user to the direction they are looking at
tooltip.meter_stagger_explanation: When meter is full, inflicts weakness and mining fatigue on next attacker for 20 seconds
tooltip.meter_spiral_explanation: If any of the user's status effect has a duration lower than 5 minutes, extends it by 50% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_allied_spiral_explanation: Extends another entity's status effects by 50% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_chaotic_spiral_explanation: If any of the user's status effect has a duration lower than 5 minutes, extends it by a random amount between 20% and 80% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_elevated_explanation: Grants, for 30 seconds, a status effect that multiplies damage dealt by 1.5, reduces damage received by 20% and increases movement speed by 65%, but deals 10% of user's max health as recoil damage each attack. Charges with each successful full hit
tooltip.meter_refresh_explanation: Heals the user by 3 to 5 health and removes a random negative status effect on user, if any present. Charges with each successful full hit
tooltip.meter_grave_keeper_explanation: Automatically charges. Gives user a back dash by sneaking in the air
tooltip.meter_heroic_spirit_explanation: Automatically charges when user is on ground. Slows down gravity when bow is drawn. Does not cancel fall damage
tooltip.meter_burst_impact_explanation: Deals an area-of-effect attack in a 5x5x5 cube centered on the next arrow that hits an entity. The attack's damage is equal to half of the arrow's damage
tooltip.meter_vampirism_explanation: Inflicts Wither I on next foe hit for 15 seconds and grants Absorption for 1 minute to user depending on damage dealt
tooltip.meter_counter_explanation: Grants user, for 20 seconds, an effect that reflects all melee damage back at the attacker and grants the user 3 knockback resistance
tooltip.meter_remote_counter_explanation: When meter is full and an attack is blocked, grants user, for 20 seconds, an effect that reflects all projectile damage back at the attacker and grants the user 3 knockback resistance
tooltip.meter_resonance_explanation: Synchronizes the user's and the nearest entity's status effects and, if target's health is up to 2.5 time higher than user's max health and target has more health than user, reduces target's health to user's health. Costs 10% of user's max health to use (cannot kill user)
tooltip.meter_domain_of_fire_explanation: Ignites all entities (except user) within a 8x2x8 volume centered on user, and if more than 5 entities are affected, grants user the Fire Guard effect for 15 seconds
tooltip.meter_neutralizing_terrain_expla: Summons a very large effect-neutralizing cloud around the user, maintaining passive effects attached to the tome
tooltip.meter_blade_beam_explanation: Swinging the dagger without hitting an entity shoots out a blade beam. The beam deals 5 damage and gains an additional point of damage for each positive effect active on user. 5 beams can be shot with a full charge
tooltip.meter_pursuit_explanation: User dashes in the direction of nearest entity. Charges quicker with each attack. 2 dashes can be executed with a full charge
tooltip.meter_snatch_explanation: Allows user to steal positive effects from another entity without damaging them by using the dagger on them. Charges quicker with each attack. Ignores cooldown
tooltip.meter_repulsion_explanation: Automatically charges. Swinging the tome summons a wind charge in front of the user. A full charge can summon 2 wind charges
message.attuning_error: Could not apply modifier: item does not support attuning
